svelte.message: AI Elements requires Svelte 5. Install: pnpm add svelte@latest

@sveltejs/kit.message: AI Elements requires SvelteKit. Create project: pnpm create svelte@latest

tailwindcss.message: AI Elements requires Tailwind CSS v4. See: https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation
